projects.name: The Naples
projects.description: The Naples Arepo is a premium residential development tailored towards meeting modern day living with contemporary architecture. The development consists of exquisitely designed 4-bedroom terrace townhouses with BQ and service plot located in a secured and fully serviced community within Voera Estate. These residential apartments are designed for savvy investors and first time home owners that desires a home in a serene and upgraded environment at reasonable prices.
projects.channelDescription: The Naples is a premium residential development tailored towards meeting modern day living with contemporary architecture. The development consists of exquisitely designed 4-bedroom terrace. Townhouses with BQ, 1, 2 and 3-Bedroom maisonettes located in a secured and fully serviced estate. These residential apartments are designed for savvy investors and first time home owners that desires a home in a serene and upgraded environment of Arepo, a suburb of Lagos. If you crave for a captivating apartment and luxurious lifestyle, at a reasonable price, consider investing in The Naples, Arepo.
projects.amenitiesDescription: The Naples will be equipped with modern facilities to give you a worthwhile living experience.
projects.exteriorDescription: Careful attention was paid to developing The Naples apartments, with manifest emphasis on simple shapes, purposeful functionality, intentional asymmetry, clean lines, natural lighting, open floor concept and smart home features. Apartments comes with balconies to give a panoramic view of the environment, aesthetics, outdoor space, fresh air and allow natural light into your apartment.
projects.interiorDescription: Ample space within each apartment helps guarantee cool interior and a home good for your health. The headroom is high enough to keep the building ventilated, increased perception of space and more natural light. The interior design is flexible, adaptable and caters to your desired lifestyle.
projects.floorDescription: The floor plan has been designed to enhance the life of occupants by maximizing space, light and airflow while simultaneously creating a natural flow between rooms. Moving through the space within each unit is seamless and fitting to your lifestyle.
projects.planDescription: The Naples Estate, Arepo, is a smart move towards securing you and your family’s future! In this estate

faq.question: What title do you have over the houses?
faq.answer: Our houses are covered by a Certificate of Occupancy.

faq.question: Are there other charges apart from the purchase price?
faq.answer: You will be charged a developmental fee of 7.5% of the purchase price which covers provision of facilities. Also, a legal fee of 3% of the purchase price will be charged to each subscriber.

faq.question: Will there be facility management services at your estate?
faq.answer: Yes. There will be comprehensive facility management services provided at our estates. An annual service charge will be payable by all subscribers, which will be used to pay for sundry services such as security services, water and waste management, and maintenance of common infrastructure within the estate.

faq.question: How long can I spread my payment for my dream home?
faq.answer: You can spread your payment over a maximum period of 24 months. However, you need to deposit a minimum of 10% of the purchase price.

faq.question: On completion, can you carry out property rental management on my property?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer property management services which help relieve owners of all the stress involved in managing their properties and guarantee them annual rental income.

faq.question: Will my house be fully finished?
faq.answer: The houses on sale will not be fully finished but semi-finished. This is to allow each subscriber to finish their unit to their own taste. However, we can undertake to complete the building at the request of the subscriber. Our semi-finished units have all external works fully completed with windows and external doors fitted, coupled with electrical wirings.

faq.question: What are not included in the semi-finished units?
faq.answer: All internal woodwork, internal doors, sanitary or electrical fittings, burglaries, tiling, POP screening, and internal painting works are all excluded.

faq.question: What if I want to buy a fully finished unit?
faq.answer: A fully finished unit will be available on demand. Reach out to our marketing team for the price of your desired unit based on your choice of interior materials and fittings.

projects.name: The Roman Heights
projects.description: Soaring to New Heights! Roman Heights by Lightway Homes is the ultimate high-rise luxury masterpiece in Arepo; the first of its kind. Get ready to elevate your lifestyle with a rooftop lounge, refreshing swimming pool, convenient lifts, modern office space, a standard gym, uninterrupted power supply, convenient parking and incredible common areas.Roman Heights comprises of two units of 3-bedroom apartments and eight units of 2bedroom maisonettes. It is a deluxe yet affordable home being developed to give you an ecstatic experience you crave for in your dream home.Secure your unit now and experience the pinnacle of luxury living!
projects.channelDescription: Welcome to Roman Heights – Where Timeless Beauty Meets Modern Luxury! Don’t miss this exclusive opportunity to be part of an extraordinary living experience. Come, embrace the allure of Roman Heights, where timeless beauty meets modern luxury, and your dream lifestyle awaits!
projects.amenitiesDescription: Roman Heights will be equipped with modern facilities to give you a worthwhile living experience.
projects.exteriorDescription: Step into a realm of exquisite elegance at Roman Heights, where we have meticulously crafted each detail to ensure your property value thrives with time. Our visionary design philosophy embraces the allure of simplicity, purposeful functionality, and captivating intentional asymmetry, all carefully balanced to create an architectural masterpiece.Prepare to be enchanted by the clean lines and open floor concept, flawlessly merging indoor and outdoor living. Delight in the abundance of natural light streaming through each unit, enhancing the harmonious blend of form and function. Roman Heights boasts multiple balconies, elegantly curated to offer you a personal haven, where you can bask in the warm embrace of the sun and savour the refreshing breeze
projects.interiorDescription: Step into a realm of boundless possibilities and limitless imagination at Roman Heights. Our interior design transcends the ordinary, embracing versatility and adaptability to suit your unique desires and needs. With soaring high ceilings, the promise of more space and light becomes an everyday reality, elevating your spirits and enriching your daily life. Indulge in the opulent aesthetics, which seamlessly blend with the ingenious space maximization techniques. The interior ambience creates an ethereal sanctuary, where comfort and beauty converge in perfect harmony. At Roman Heights, we redefine the art of living, crafting an innovative and unobtrusive environment that complements your lifestyle, granting you a sense of fulfilment like never before.
projects.floorDescription: The floor plan has been designed to enhance the life of occupants by maximizing space, light and airflow while simultaneously creating a natural flow between rooms. Moving through the space within each unit is seamless and fitting to your lifestyle.
projects.planDescription: The Roman Height Estate, Arepo, is a smart move towards securing you and your family’s future! In this estate

projects.name: The Novara Courts
projects.description: Novara Court is the newest mixed residential development from the stable of Light Way Homes. Novara Court is beautifully crafted with particular emphasis on attractive and eco-friendly environment where your dream of a livable and ecstatic atmosphere becomes realizable. Enjoy the wellness, flora, fauna, and the green living that comes with Novara Court, where you experience nature at its best. Novara Court is nestled within a well-developed environment and surrounded by different residential estates as well as various industrial facilities, amongst which are Nestlé, Olam Group, International Breweries PLC and Apple and Pears Ltd
projects.channelDescription: Novara Court is located at Orilemo, Mowe-Ofada by Interchange, Obafemi Owode Local Government Area of Ogun State. The area is one of the fastest real estate corridor within the precincts of the Lagos Ogun state boundary, and offers a serene environment suitable for residential, academics, home-offices and more. The newly reconstructed Lagos-Ibadan expressway and the on-going reconstruction of Sagamu-Papalanto road by Dangote makes accessibility to Novara Court seamless. With the massive infrastructure upgrade within the precinct of Novara Court, Subscribers are assured of substantial return on investment, which makes subscription in the estate either for immediate occupation, land banking or investment, a worthwhile adventure..
projects.amenitiesDescription: Novara Court will be equipped with modern facilities to give you a worthwhile living experience.
projects.exteriorDescription: Careful attention was paid to developing The Naples apartments, with manifest emphasis on simple shapes, purposeful functionality, intentional asymmetry, clean lines, natural lighting, open floor concept and smart home features. Apartments comes with balconies to give a panoramic view of the environment, aesthetics, outdoor space, fresh air and allow natural light into your apartment.
projects.interiorDescription: Ample space within each apartment helps guarantee cool interior and a home good for your health. The headroom is high enough to keep the building ventilated, increased perception of space and more natural light. The interior design is flexible, adaptable and caters to your desired lifestyle.
projects.floorDescription: The floor plan has been designed to enhance the life of occupants by maximizing space, light and airflow while simultaneously creating a natural flow between rooms. Moving through the space within each unit is seamless and fitting to your lifestyle.
projects.planDescription: The Novara Court Estate, Arepo, is a smart move towards securing you and your family’s future!
projects.paymentPlan: Secure a plot with N200,000 initial deposit and spread balance in 6 or 12 months.

faq.question: Where is Novara Court located?
faq.answer: Novara Court is situated at Oriilemo, Mowe Ofada, by Interchange, Obafemi-Owode Local Government Area.

faq.question: Who is the developer of Novara Court?
faq.answer: LightWay Homes and Investment Limited.

faq.question: What title is on Novara Court?
faq.answer: Novara Court is covered by a registered survey.

faq.question: Are there any encumbrances on the land?
faq.answer: No, the land is free from every known government acquisition or interest and no adverse claimant on the land.

faq.question: What is the size of the plot?
faq.answer: 300sqm, 500sqm, and 600sqm respectively.

faq.question: Are there other charges aside from the price of the plot?
faq.answer:
Yes, the charges include:
- Developmental fee: N2,500/sqm
- Deed of Assignment: N200,000
- Survey and Allocation: N300,000

faq.question: How long can I spread my payment for my dream plot?
faq.answer:
You can spread your payment over a maximum period of 24 months. However, you need to deposit a minimum of N200,000 while the balance can be spread over the number of months you decide to choose.
Note: Payment spread between 0 - 6 months is interest-free, while payment spread beyond 6 months attracts a 10% interest charge per annum.

faq.question: What document will I get after the initial deposit?
faq.answer: Offer letter, receipt of payment, and contract of sales agreement.

testimonials.author: Bukola Falana
testimonials.testimonial: “The team was not only professional but also friendly and approachable. The day I called was the same day I inspected the site. After my due diligence, I paid for my two-bedroom maisonette, and to my surprise, I got my receipt and contract of sale the same day.
testimonials.testimonial2: I would highly recommend their services to anyone in need of a trusted and reliable real estate company.

testimonials.author: Maryam Abubakar
testimonials.testimonial: “Light Way Homes delivered as promised with my Land and ensured my allocation and documentation were done immediately after my final payment.Thank you for helping me find my dream home. I look forward to working with you again the future.

teams.name: Funmilayo Adesanya
teams.about: Funmi Adesanya is the Managing Director/CEO of Light Way Homes and Investment Limited. She is a highly accomplished and visionary professional with over fourteen years of experience in the real estate industry. She has a broad range of expertise managing real estate investments, properties development and management. She possesses a diverse skill set, specializing in sales and marketing, corporate/administrative functions, construction, training, capacity building, coaching, and mentoring. Funmi’s exceptional leadership skills and strategic mindset have propelled her to the forefront of the industry, making her a trusted name in the market.
teams.about2: Funmi has successfully navigated the ever-changing landscape of the real estate sector. Her extensive knowledge and proficiency in market trends, property valuation, and investment analysis have consistently delivered outstanding results. She has demonstrated exceptional negotiation skills and a keen eye for identifying lucrative investment opportunities, enabling her to optimize returns for clients and stakeholders.
teams.about3: Funmi's integrity and ability to foster strong relationships with clients, contractors, and key industry professionals have been instrumental in building Light Way Homes into a reputable brand. She has been involved in numerous high-profile real estate projects, ranging from residential and commercial developments to large-scale infrastructure projects. Her hands-on approach, combined with her comprehensive understanding of the construction process, ensures that projects are executed to the highest standards of quality and efficiency. Funmi holds a Bachelor's degree in Political Science from the University of Ilorin and continues to enhance her knowledge through various professional development programs and certifications, staying up-to-date with the latest industry advancements and best practices. With her vast experience, comprehensive knowledge, integrity, and exceptional leadership skills, Funmi has established herself as a prominent figure in the real estate industry. Her unwavering commitment to excellence, combined with her strategic vision, continues to drive her company's success and position it as a market leader.

teams.name: Olumide Olujuyigbe
teams.about: Arc Olumide Olujuyigbe is a well trained chartered architect with over 10 years working experience in designs construction and project management . He is a masters degree holder from Obafemi Awolowo University and certified member of the Nigerian Institute of Architects as well as Architect Regularization Council of Nigeria.
teams.about2: Architect Olumide prides himself in the effective use of space to creating master piece designs that are both functional and aesthetically appealing. Proficient in the use of revenant softwares, he has good knowledge of BIM standards and green architecture. He is happily married and a father of two.

teams.name: Agboola O.Osunbanjo
teams.about: Engr. Osunbanjo is the principal partner of DAOTEC ENGINEERS, a firm that specializes in Civil/ Structural engineering, Construction and Consultancy. He possesses a B. Sc (Hons.), degree of Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife in Civil Engineering. In addition, he is Corporate Member of Nigeria Society of Engineers (MNSE), and a registered Member, Council for the Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria (COREN). He has over thirty years of experience in Design, Construction and Management of Civil, Geological and Building Engineering Structures.
teams.about2: He has been involved in various projects, which include Grenadines Homes Arepo, Lekki-Ajah, Makun-Shagamu and Katampe Abuja, His Glory Estate Ikorodu among others.
